document.full_text: a european bank that was later exposed to the madoff scandal and an arab company now majority-owned by the libyan central bank were among an odd assortment of firms that dug deep into the u.s. federal reserve's coffers as the financial crisis exploded in 2008.
document.title: european banks big fed borrowers in 2008 crisis
lines_and_colors: a european bank that was later exposed to the madoff scandal and an arab company now majority-owned by the libyan central bank were among an odd assortment of firms that dug deep into the u.s. federal reserve's coffers as the financial crisis exploded in 2008.
